body_text: Like in preference experiments, we'll need to set the value of default branch roll outs during startup. When doing so, we need to store the original default value, in case we need to roll the value back before the next restart.
body_html: Like in preference experiments, we'll need to set the value of default branch roll outs during startup. When doing so, we need to store the original default value, in case we need to roll the value back before the next restart.
title: Set preferences for default branch rollouts at startup
body: Like in preference experiments, we'll need to set the value of default branch roll outs during startup. When doing so, we need to store the original default value, in case we need to roll the value back before the next restart.
